name: Sucrose
title: Harmless Sweetie
description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

normal.1: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.2: This is a little embarrassing, but though the elemental lifeforms birthed through this procedure dissipate very rapidly, they are incredibly useful when adventuring. Even failed experiments can have practical applications.

description.0: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit.
description.1: While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.4: If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro> energy, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.5: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.7: Sucrose used to give names to her volatile Anemo Hypostases, but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass Baron Bunny the 893rd.

description.0: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery by an amount equal to 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.
When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.
The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.
Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.
